data.comment: The match is underway at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Everton.
In the minute 1, Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 3, In London Tottenham drive forward through Heung Min Son. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal kick for Everton at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Tottenham to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Everton at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Martin Atkinson signals a Tottenham throw-in in Everton's half.
Can Tottenham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Everton's half?
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Everton, close to Tottenham's area.
Everton have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 9, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Everton.
Martin Atkinson awards Tottenham a goal kick.
Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In the minute 16, Martin Atkinson signals a Tottenham throw-in in Everton's half.
Everton's Richarlison breaks free at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 17, Free kick Tottenham.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
In the minute 20, Tottenham to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Everton in the half of Tottenham.
Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Yerry Mina for Everton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Everton have a goal kick.
Everton push forward at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and James Rodriguez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tottenham defence.
In the minute 27, Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Important block from the Tottenham defence as Richarlison fires in a strike for Everton.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Martin Atkinson signals a Everton throw-in in Tottenham's half.
In the minute 32, Everton have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Tottenham's Dele Alli is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 35, Everton needs to be cautious. Tottenham have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Martin Atkinson awards Everton a goal kick.
In the minute 37, In London Everton attack through James Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Everton.
Throw-in Tottenham.
Tottenham's Matt Doherty gets in a shot on goal at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Everton.
Everton drives forward and Richarlison gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
In the minute 46, Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Everton.
Jose Mourinho (Tottenham) is making a first substitution, with Moussa Sissoko replacing Dele Alli.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Everton to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Everton at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
Everton's James Rodriguez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Everton surge into the attack at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium but Richarlisonâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
In the minute 53, In London, Andre Gomes of Everton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Everton.
In the minute 55, Goal! Everton take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
That's a fine assist from Lucas Digne.
Throw-in for Everton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Steven Bergwijn is replacing Harry Winks for the home team.
Martin Atkinson signals a Tottenham throw-in in Everton's half.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 63, Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Dominic Calvert-Lewin for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 68, Carlo Ancelotti is making the team's first substitution at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium with Gylfi Sigurdsson replacing Andre Gomes.
Lucas Moura for Tottenham drives towards goal at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Richarlison for Everton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 69, Tottenham have a goal kick.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
In the minute 71, Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Everton are pushing forward but Richarlison's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Everton pushes forward through Seamus Coleman, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 75, Throw-in high up the field for Tottenham in London.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Matt Doherty with Tanguy Ndombele. This is the third substitution made today by Jose Mourinho.
In the minute 77, Free kick Everton.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Harry Kane's header is off-target for Tottenham.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Everton at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Tottenham's Harry Kane goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Throw-in Tottenham.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 84, Dominic Calvert-Lewin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Everton.
The match at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Richarlison, who is down injured.
Tottenham's Pierre Hojbjerg has been booked in London.
In the minute 87, Richarlison has recovered and rejoins the match in London.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Moise Kean is on a sub for Dominic Calvert-Lewin for Everton.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Everton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Everton in the half of Tottenham.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
Tom Davies is replacing James Rodriguez for Everton at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
